thread.title: Wisconsin Mom
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Wisconsin Mom

author: Wisconsin Mom
title: Wisconsin Mom
text: I didn't try these out until my kids were heading to Pre-Kindergarten, but I wish I had used them from the time they were infants! These labels are great! I recommend them to people all of the time. They are great for daycare and school, and I have even recommended them for people who have to label items for nursing homes and hospitals. I cannot say enough great things about these labels.
